channel.title: 30 days (23 actually) until I launch SeeingStars, a new product
channel.description:
...if you are bored/interested/looking for distractions, follow along with my terse blog posts daily until launch. Read it here: http://blog.barbarysoftware.com/
It's a prototype I put together last year, and now I'm publicly committing to getting the product out the door. Nothing like the spectre of public humiliation to keep me focussed.
Luckily I've already got a product for sale, so I able to reuse a lot of stuff.
Feel free to throw questions and suggestions at me.
